title: Developing Alternative Teaching Methodology Adoption Strategies for Physical Education Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational philosophy as a physical education teacher and experience in traditional PE instruction
context.additional_context: Instructional environment design using Constraint-Led Approach (CLA) to help pre-service teachers accustomed to traditional physical education methods adopt alternative pedagogies

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain core principles of alternative game-based pedagogy through the Constraints-Led Approach (CLA).
Learners can analyze limitations of traditional physical education teaching methods and evaluate the applicability of alternative pedagogies.
Preservice teachers can apply alternative teaching methods at least three times through simulation-based practical activities in online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
